Title: My Bank Trade? An 'Insurance Policy' on BofA I Hope Doesn't Pay Off
Description: I bought a small number of July puts on Bank of America, after the fall of Silicon Valley Bank. Here's why and why I don't necessarily hope it works....SIVB

Title: US Treasury's Yellen Says Passed Up Her Weekend Due to SVB Bankruptcy
Description: MOSCOW (Sputnik) - US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Sunday she was working through the weekend to resolve the aftermath of the Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) collapse.
